sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"坚持"之意。
means: insist ： 通常用于对意见、主张等的坚持。
persist ： 用于褒义指坚持继续做某事，但更常用于贬义，指不听劝告，顽固坚持。
persevere ： 含褒义，强调坚持不懈的努力。
adhere与to连用，指坚持意见、计划或承诺等，含坚持不懈之意。
cling和to连用，指对信仰、意见、习惯等的坚持。

sentence.Network_en: They insist on tastier chocolate than the anaemic British stuff.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们坚持要比淡而无味的英国货味道更好的巧克力。

sentence.Network_en: The psychologists insist, however, that they are not being prescriptive.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而，心理学家坚称他们并非一味灌输。

sentence.Network_en: Our buyers insist on high standards of workmanship and materials.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的买主对工艺和材料坚持要高标准。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... existence n 存在，生存 insist v 坚持；硬要 insistence n 坚持；强调.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... inside prep. 在……里面 insist vi. 坚持；坚决认为 inspect vt. 检查；检验；审视.
宾语从句_互动百科 ... 决定 decide; 坚决主张 insist; 命令 order、command.
英语B级考试必背1000词汇 - 豆丁网 ... 急速;急忙 haste 470 坚持;坚决要求 insist 515 笑;笑声 laughter 426.

list.abs: Building would not , he insisted , be frozen anywhere in Jerusalem ., 他坚称不会冻结在耶路撒冷任何地方的建设工程.
unforgivingly , he insisted that she pay her debt to the last penny ., 他坚持要她还清他全部的钱 , 真是不体谅人.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... existent 存在的，现存的 insistent 坚持的 emergent 紧急的.
日常英语 - 豆丁网 ... inorganic a. 无生物的；无机的 insistent a. 坚持的；逼人注意的 inspiration n. 灵感；妙想；鼓舞.
insistent 坚持不懈的insistently 坚持地insnare 落于陷阱
insistence 坚持insistency 强迫insistent 坚持不懈的

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'persist, persevere'): from Latin insistere 'persist', from in- 'upon' + sistere 'stand'

entry.tran: 坚持;坚决认为(或主张、要求)
entry.def: If you insist that something should be done, you say so very firmly and refuse to give in about it. If you insist on something, you say firmly that it must be done or provided.

example.ex: My family insisted that I should not give in, but stay and fight...
example.tran: 家里人坚持认为我不应让步,而应该留下来继续抗争。

example.ex: She insisted on being present at all the interviews...
example.tran: 她坚持所有采访自己都要在场。

entry.def: If you insist that something is the case, you say so very firmly and refuse to say otherwise, even though other people do not believe you.

example.ex: The president insisted that he was acting out of compassion, not opportunism...
example.tran: 总统坚持说他如此做是出于同情而不是为了投机。

means.word_mean: 1. be insistent and refuse to budge;

auth_sentence.content: We insist on viewing it through a western prism.
auth_sentence.res_content: We insist on viewing it through a western prism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We insist on viewing it through a western prism.

auth_sentence.content: Sport England insist however that is not the case.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sport England insist however that is not the case.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sport England insist however that is not the case.

auth_sentence.content: But they insist they are okay to eat now.
auth_sentence.res_content: But they insist they are okay to eat now.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But they insist they are okay to eat now.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不+resistible可抗拒的→adj.不可抗拒的
persist[v.坚持]+ent表形容词→adj.固执的,坚持的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ent表形容词→adj.抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ible可..的→adj.可抵抗的
assist[v.帮助]+ant人→n.助手,助教;辅助物
consist[v.[in]在于,存在于;[of]由…组成,由…构成]+ence表名词→n.坚固性,浓度

stems_affixes.value_cn: 存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
stems_affixes.word_buile: exist[v.存在;生存;生活]+ence表名词→n.存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
insist[v.[on]坚持要求,坚决主张,坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持,强求
persist[v.坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持, 持续
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ance表名词→n.[to]抵抗,反抗;抵抗力,阻力;电阻
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ence表名词→n.抵抗力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生存, 生活, 留存
stems_affixes.word_buile: subsist[v.生存,存在,供养]+ence表名词→n.生存, 生活, 留存
as加强动作+sist站→站过来→帮助
con共同+sist站立→站到一起→帮助
de加强+sist站立→站着不动→停止
sub下面+sist站立→站下去,活下去

Sentence.sentence: While using quality ingredients, David Tamlyn insists that the dishes should be offered at reasonable prices .
She insists that it's exposing workers to unnecessarily high doses of radiation.
I'm sorry you feel that way, but my mother insists that he come.
But Monsanto, the agricultural giant, insists it has a patent on the kind of genetically modified seeds Bowman used―and that the patent continues to all of the progeny (后代)of those seeds.
Gary insisted on buying the food for the picnic.

means.word_mean: 坚决宣称, 坚持认为，坚持说，固执己见

sentences.en: I will have another glass if you insist.
sentences.cn: 你这样坚持我就再喝一杯。

sentences.en: I insisted that they should wait for our return.
sentences.cn: 我坚决要求他们等我们回来。

sentences.en: We insist upon a definite answer.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要得到一个肯定的答复。

jushi.english: I will have another glass if you insist.
jushi.chinese: 你这样坚持,我就再喝一杯。

jushi.english: Madam Curie insisted (that) there was something in nature that gave out radiation.
jushi.chinese: 居里夫人坚信自然界存在着能发出射线的物质。

jushi.english: They insisted that she should be invited.
